questions.question: Where did Sue and Johnsy live?

options.text: In a city colony of artists

questions.answer: In a city colony of artists

questions.question: What profession did Sue and Johnsy follow?
questions.answer: Artists

questions.question: What illness did Johnsy suffer from?
questions.answer: Pneumonia

questions.question: What did the doctor say Johnsy needed most?
questions.answer: Will to live

questions.question: What was Johnsy counting while looking outside?
questions.answer: Ivy leaves

questions.question: What belief did Johnsy have about the leaves?
questions.answer: Her life depended on them

questions.question: Who was Behrman?
questions.answer: An artist

questions.question: What dream did Behrman always talk about?
questions.answer: Painting a masterpiece

questions.question: What did Behrman paint on the wall?
questions.answer: The last ivy leaf

questions.question: What happened to Behrman after painting?
questions.answer: He fell ill and died

questions.question: What did the doctor say Johnsy needed most?
questions.answer: Will to live

questions.answer: Ivy leaves

questions.answer: Her life depended on them

questions.question: Who was Behrman?
questions.answer: An artist

questions.question: What dream did Behrman always talk about?
questions.answer: Painting a masterpiece

questions.question: What did Behrman paint on the wall?
questions.answer: The last ivy leaf

questions.question: What happened to Behrman after painting?
questions.answer: He fell ill and died

questions.question: Why did Sue take special care of Johnsy?
questions.answer: Because Johnsy was seriously ill with pneumonia.

questions.question: What made Johnsy lose hope of living?
questions.answer: Her belief that she would die when the last leaf fell.

questions.question: How did Sue try to help Johnsy recover?
questions.answer: She encouraged her and took good care of her.

questions.question: Why did Sue call Behrman to their flat?
questions.answer: To pose as a model for her painting.

questions.question: What kind of artist was Behrman?
questions.answer: He was a failure who dreamed of painting a masterpiece.

questions.question: What was Johnsy’s false belief?
questions.answer: She believed her life was linked to the ivy leaves.

questions.question: Why did the last leaf not fall?
questions.answer: Because Behrman had painted it on the wall.

questions.question: How did the last leaf affect Johnsy?
questions.answer: It restored her hope and will to live.

questions.question: What sacrifice did Behrman make?
questions.answer: He sacrificed his life to save Johnsy.

questions.question: What message does the story convey?
questions.answer: Hope, friendship, and selfless sacrifice can save lives.
